LightStep | Software Engineer, Product Engineer, | San Francisco | Full-Time | Onsite | https://lightstep.com/careers

LightStep makes understanding distributed systems simpler by providing visibility into the entire application stack, from web and mobile clients through all levels of the application and data storage systems. We help people understand why their systems are broken and slow, in real time.

We're looking for a wide array of software engineers: distributed systems developers to improve our scaling story, product engineers to develop robust and useful data exploration & visualizations, open-source specialists to help instrument frameworks and infrastructure components, and API specialists to help our customers build great things on top of our insight.

Please feel free to email me if you're interested in learning more: joe.blubaugh@gmail.com / joe@lightstep.com
